vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παρά-κλητος, ον,
called to one's aid, in a court of justice: as substantive, legal assistant, advocate, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 summoned, δοῦλοι [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II intercessor, [NT+1st c.AD+], of the Holy Spirit, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
counselor, counsellor
one called, or sent for to assist another; an advocate, intercessor, helper, one who encourages and comforts; in the NT it refers exclusively to the Holy Spirit and to Jesus Christ; pleads the cause of another, 1Jn. 2:1; generically one present to render various beneficial service, and thus the Paraclete, whose influence and operation were to compensate for the departure of Christ himself, Jn. 14:16, 26; 15:26; 16:7*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Consolador, Intercesor (se refiere al Espíritu Santo y en 1JN.2:1 a Jesucristo)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 代求者, 中保, 幫助者
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 代求者, 中保, 帮助者
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: được gọi đến bên cạnh; một người bênh vực, một luật sư, người bào chữa; Đấng Pa-rác-lê; đấng cáo giục; Đấng An Ủi
